title: Abakanowicz in Australia
creator_credit: Christopher McGill, Malcolm Otton, Crafts Council of Australia and Film Australia
brief_description: Polish artist Magdalena Abakanowicz prepares for an exhibition of her work in Australia. We see her exhibits of large rope, hessian and string three-dimensional forms. She comments upon her intended purpose in working with such materials. Narrated by Margaret Throsby.
creator_credit_for_label: Christopher McGill, Malcolm Otton, Crafts Council of Australia and Film Australia
